short_summary: Acquisition of SA Office Furniture categories 1, 2, 5 and 6 for ISC Montreal
description: This tender solicitation is for the acquisition of SA Office Furniture categories 1, 2, 5, and 6, located in Montreal, Quebec, Canada. The acquisition will be based on a bid submitted by suppliers, with the lowest price being the primary criteria for the selection of the winning bidder. The successful bidder will be required to deliver the acquired furniture to the ISC Montreal location.

full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement: Acquisition of Office Furniture

**Reference Information**

* Title: EF950-240021, Acquisition, Delivery, and Installation of SA Office Furniture Categories 1, 2, 5, and 6 for Indigenous Services Canada Montreal
* Reference Number: WS3972710151 - Doc3972759264
* Amendment Number: 9
* Solicitation Number: WS3972710151
* Publication Date: 2023-05-03
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-06-01T14:00:00 (Eastern Time)

**Request for Proposal (RFP)**

Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC) invites bidders to submit a proposal for the acquisition of SA Office Furniture categories 1, 2, 5, and 6 located in Montreal, Quebec, Canada. The procurement is being conducted under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the Department of Indigenous Services will be the end-user.

**Procurement Details**

* Procurement Category: General Distribution (GD)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Submission Requirements**

All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted by 14:00 HAE on June 1st, 2023. Late submissions will be declared non-responsive.

**Contact Information**

Julien, Lisa-Marie (SPAC/PSPC)
lisa-marie.julien@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Important Notes**

* The end-user for this procurement is the Department of Indigenous Services.
* The procurement is limited to SA Office Furniture categories 1, 2, 5, and 6.
* Bidders must comply with all requirements outlined in the RFP and supporting documents.

## REPLY TO THIS ADVERTISEMENT
Please note that you should only reply to this announcement if you are properly registered and qualified in this category. We encourage you to consult the full solicitation package before attending a mandatory public opening of bid.

I have removed the unnecessary fields and formatted the entry in a more professional manner using markdown format.

Note that i have also included an important note at the end to emphasize the requirement for bidders to register and to read the full solicitation package before attending the public bid opening. I have also, changed the contact information into only English. 

This format looks more professional in comparison to the original, and easier to read and scan,
